title: Which is better, the Redmi K30 5G or the K30 4G? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 4G uses the slightly older Snapdragon 730G chipset and the 5G uses the newer Snapdragon 765G chipset. Xiaomi Redmi K30 5G Specifications: Display - 6.67" (16.94 cm) Performance - Single + Single + Hexa Core 2.4 GHz + 2.2 GHz + 1.8 GHz, 6 GB RAM Storage - 64 GB 256 GB (Expandable) Camera - 64 MP + 8 MP + 5 MP + 2 MP (Primary) 20 MP + 2 MP(Front) Battery - 4500 mAh Price - RS 20,100 Xiaomi Redmi K30 4G Specifications: Display - 6.67" (16.94 cm) Performance - Dual + Hexa Core 2.2 GHz + 1.8 GHz, 6 GB RAM Storage - 64 GB 256 GB (Expandable) Camera - 64 MP + 8 MP + 2 MP + 2 MP (Primary) 20 MP + 2 MP(Front) Battery - 4500 mAh Price - RS 16,100
I think you should fo for iPhone 7. iPhone 7 is better than both mi phones
